attributes.action: Allow the Coca Cola truck to visit Cumbria
attributes.additional_details: It is a symbol of the start of the festive period that has been around for generations, and it its down to peoples own rights about what they consume or a parents choice what their child consumes. You don't see them banning fast food chains etc. you dont see the government banning every thing thats bad for people, only things they dont really make any money off
attributes.background: Cumbria county Council has issued a letter to the Coca Cola truck tour group to say they are not Welcome in Cumbria

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
